entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
